attributes.action: To support an independent review into the origins and spread of the coronavirus.
attributes.additional_details: To inform people that there was no cover ups and that an international devastating virus is investigated. If there is nothing to hide then lets have the facts
attributes.background:
Australia last week called for all members of the World Health Organization (WHO) to support an independent review into the origins and spread of the coronavirus, and is lobbying world leaders.

An "honest assessment" of the pandemic would seek to strengthen the WHO's role.
